channel.title: [PI] Dying Emote help
channel.description: I've just noticed today, that whenever I die, the char doesnt fall down and drop loot, he just stands there and dissapears and drops loot, anyways, Q: How do I add the Dying emote? Instead of just standing there and dissapearing back to Lumby?

item.title: [PI] Dying Emote help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

RoidScape.Darkbb:

trust me, im telling you from expierence that it is better to just leave this alone…it is so touchy. when i did this, mine did the same thing, it does it right now…but when someone dies and they get teled back…they are in some kinda weird trance on the ground and they cant move until they log out then back in…so im telling you please just leave it be…there is no fix once youve messed it up…

It doesn’t freeze, the emote was just never added. But I want to add the emote, it’s not a glitch.

Read full topic
